text: Kendall Gill is a retired American basketball player. He is now a basketball television analyst. Gill was chosen in the 1990 NBA Draft by the Charlotte Hornets. He played in the NBA for 15 years. ==References== Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:3x3 basketball players Category:African-American basketball players Category:African-American boxers Category:American basketball players Category:American television presenters Category:Chicago Bulls players Category:Miami Heat players Category:Milwaukee Bucks players Category:Minnesota Timberwolves players Category:New Jersey Nets players Category:People from Olympia Fields, Illinois Category:Seattle SuperSonics players Category:Shooting guards Category:Small forwards Category:Sportspeople from Chicago
title: Kendall Gill
